attributes.action: Let 16 years olds leave school if they want to don't change the law for it
attributes.background: Let people at 16 years olds leave school if they want to

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Government hasn't announced any plans to change the current duty for young people to participate in education or training until at least their 18th birthday.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
